full_title: What’s My Name by Ringo Starr
name: What’s My Name

songs.full_title: Gotta Get Up to Get Down by Ringo Starr (Ft. Joe Walsh)
songs.title: Gotta Get Up to Get Down
songs.title_with_featured: Gotta Get Up to Get Down (Ft. Joe Walsh)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Ringo Starr]
I know a man who just works out on Twitter
Just getting fat, yeah, he's not gettin’ thinner
Looks out the window, and what does he see
He don't see nothing, he got no one to please

[Chorus: Ringo Starr]
Gotta get up, you gotta get up
You gotta get up to get down (Get down)

[Guitar Solo]

[Verse 2: Joe Walsh]
Everybody's on the Internet, what’s up with that
Your body just waitin' for your brain to come back
Can't be cool just sittin' around
You gotta get up to get down

[Chorus: Joe Walsh]
Gotta get up to get down
I said you gotta get up to get down
Get down

[Chorus: Joe Walsh]
You gotta get up to get down
I said you gotta get up to get down
You gotta get up to get down

[Verse 3: Ringo Starr]
I got a woman, you know what I mean
I got the crackers, but she's got the cream
Every morning when I open my eyes
My heart stops beating when I see her big smile

[Verse 4: Joe Walsh]
Everybody's on Facebook, doin' their thing
Nobody knows what the thing is
Tweetin' up a storm, yeah, they’re crawlin’ on the ground
Gotta get up to get down

[Chorus: Ringo Starr]
Gotta get up, gotta get up
Gotta get up to get down

[Chorus: Ringo Starr & Joe Walsh]
You gotta get up, you gotta get up
You gotta get up to get down

[Chorus: Ringo Starr & Joe Walsh]
Gotta get up to get down
You gotta get up to get down

[Chorus: Ringo Starr]
Gotta get up, you gotta get up
You gotta get up to get down

[Chorus: Ringo Starr]
Gotta get up, Gotta get up
Gotta get up to get down

[Chorus: Ringo Starr & Joe Walsh]
Gotta get up, you gotta get up
I said you gotta get up to get down

[Chorus: Ringo Starr & Joe Walsh]
Gotta get up, you gotta get up
You gotta get up to get down

[Outro: Ringo Starr]
You gotta get up to get down, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Gotta get up
Gotta get up
You gotta get up to get down

songs.full_title: It's Not Love That You Want by Ringo Starr
songs.title: It’s Not Love That You Want
songs.title_with_featured: It's Not Love That You Want
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
It's not love that you want
Yes, it's love that you need
Give me love

[Verse 1]
Some days when you fall apart
Waking up with a broken heart
We've been there before
Just don't know what to do
And when you're full of doubt
Always looking for the easy way out
Searching for love
But nothing's comin' through

[Pre-Chorus]
It never works out
Runnin' away (Runnin' away!)
You know you gotta stand up
And face the day

[Chorus]
It's not love that you want
But it's love that you need
Give me love

[Verse 2]
When you're feelin' the sun don't shine
Don't worry, we got plenty of time
All you can do
Is let that feelin' go
You're not alone at the end of the day
There's always someone who can show you the way
Just reach out
It's always up to you

[Pre-Chorus]
It never works out
Runnin' away (Runnin' away!)
You know you gotta stand up
And face the day

[Chorus]
It's not love that you want
Yes, it's love that you need
Give me love

[Chorus]
It's not love that you want
Yes, it's love that you need
Give me love

[Outro]
It's not love (It's not love) that you want (That you want)
Yes, it's love (Yes, it's love) that you need
Give me love, give me love, give me love

songs.full_title: Grow Old with Me by Ringo Starr (Ft. Paul McCartney)
songs.title: Grow Old with Me
songs.title_with_featured: Grow Old with Me (Ft. Paul McCartney)
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1: Ringo]
Grow old along with me
The best is yet to be
When our time has come
We will be as one
God bless our love
God bless our love

[Verse 2: Ringo]
Grow old along with me
Two branches of one tree
Face the settin' sun
When the day is done
God bless our love
God bless our love

[Bridge: Both]
Spendin' our lives together
Man and wife together
World without end
World without end

[Verse 3: Ringo]
Grow old along with me
Whatever fate decrees
We will see it through
For our love is true
God bless our love
God bless our love

songs.title: Magic
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
We were takin' a summer stroll
The ocean seemed so blue
You were holdin' my hand, feet in the sand
Like lovers do

[Pre-Chorus]
This reminds me of so many years ago
Times like these, I just got to let you know

[Chorus]
It's one of those things, it's magic
Like only lovers know
It's one of those things, it's magic
And I never wanna let you go
It's one of those things, it's magic
I hope it never ends
I don't wanna sound romantic
I wanna be more than just friends

[Verse 2]
I can still see the sun in your eyes
After all these years
You make all of the stars come out
The darkness disappears

[Pre-Chorus]
I'm reminded of just how much you care
My life is never empty because you are always there

[Chorus]
It's one of those things, it's magic
Like only lovers know
It's one of those things, it's magic
And I never wanna let you go

[Chorus]
It's one of those things, it's magic
Like only lovers know
It's one of those things, it's magic
And I never wanna let you go
It's one of those things, it's magic
I hope it never ends
I don't wanna sound romantic
I wanna be more than just friends

[Outro]
It's one of those things, it's magic
It's one of those things, it's magic
(It's one of those things, it's magic, magic)
Magic (Magic)
It's one of those things, it's magic (Magic)

songs.title: Money
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
The best things in life are free
But you can keep them for the birds and bees

[Chorus]
Now, give me money (That's what I want)
That's what I want (That's what I want)
That's what I want (That's what I want)
That's what I want

[Verse 2]
Your lovin' gives me a thrill
But your lovin' don't pay my bills

[Chorus]
Now, give me money (That's what I want)
That's what I want (That's what I want)
That's what I want (That's what I want)
That's what I want

[Verse 3]
Money don't get everything, it's true
But what it don't get, I can't use

[Chorus]
Now, give me money (That's what I want)
That's what I want (That's what I want)
That's what I want (That's what I want)
That's what I want

[Verse 3]
Money don't get everything, it's true
But what it don't get, I can't use

[Chorus]
Now, give me money (That's what I want)
That's what I want (That's what I want)
That's what I want (That's what I want)
That's what I want

[Outro]
You give me money (That's what I want)
Whole lot of money (That's what I want)
Yeah, give me money (That's what I want)
Give me lots of money, baby (That's what I want)
That's what I want (That's what I want)
That's what I want
Yeah, give me money, baby (That's what I want)
Gotta give me lots of money, baby (That's what I want)
Give me money (That's what I want)
I said, money (That's what I want)
That's what I want (That's what I want)
That's what I want

songs.title: Better Days
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Take your picture, quick, right now
Make it last for one more go 'round
Hold on even though the names will change
Some of us made it to the other side
Others didn't, and who knows why?
But those who've gone, I swear you'll still remain

[Chorus]
Better days are 'bout to come
Better days are 'bout to come
Better days, oh child, are gonna blow your mind
Better days are 'bout to come
Feel like beating like a drum
So you better grab a tighter hold tonight
Tomorrow's just behind the setting sun
And the better, better days are 'bout to come

[Verse 2]
Take your picture, quick, right now
Make it last for one more go 'round
Hold on before the curtain falls
We survived those nights at the Troubadour
Braved those scenes a life ago
Back to Monte Carlo, sold it all (Yes, I did)

[Chorus]
Better days are 'bout to come
Better days are 'bout to come
Better days, oh child, are gonna blow your mind
Better days are 'bout to come
Feel like beating like a drum
So you better grab a tighter hold tonight
Tomorrow's just behind the setting sun
And the better, better days are 'bout to come (Alright!)

[Bridge]
(Yeah, yeah, yeah)
No, this won't be the last ride
Don't worry when it ends
We're only gettin' happier
We're comin' 'round again
This won't be the last time
Don't worry when it ends
We're only gettin' happier
So peace and love, my friend

[Chorus]
Better days are 'bout to come
Better days are 'bout to come
Better days, oh child, are gonna blow your mind
(Blow your mind, yeah)
Better days are 'bout to come
Feel like beating like a drum
So you better grab a tighter hold tonight
Tomorrow's just behind the setting sun
And the better, better days are 'bout to come

songs.full_title: Life is Good by Ringo Starr
songs.title: Life is Good
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
It might take an hour, could take a minute
That's okay as long as you're in it
Life is good
Sun comes up, things go down
My, oh, my, when you're around
Life is good, life is good
Life is good

[Chorus]
How many times can you tell yourself
Something good?
A thousand times
Sometimes is not enough
I promise you that it will change in a flash
If you could
Get real lucky and find somebody
That you can love

[Verse 2]
Maps get lost, bridges get burned
Thank the Lord for the lessons we've learned
Life is good
I've had bad days when things go wrong
When it all comes together, I can sing this song
Life is good, life is good
Life is good

[Chorus]
How many times can you tell yourself
Something good? (Something good, something good)
A thousand times
Sometimes is not enough
I promise you that it will change in a flash
If you could (If you could, if you could)
Get real lucky and find somebody
That you can love (Love)

[Outro]
It might take an hour, it could take a minute
That's okay as long as you're in it
Life is good, life is good
Life is good
Life is good
Life is good

songs.full_title: Thank God for Music by Ringo Starr
songs.title: Thank God for Music
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Hangin' 'round, around the grooves
Spinnin' in the summer air
When you're lost, can't find a tune
He answers every prayer

[Verse 2]
Seven-eight, thirty-three, forty-five
Soundtrack on forever
Play it back, rewind your life
Pressed chords always sounds better

[Pre-Chorus]
There's a heaven on the radio
We sang along to every station
There's a heaven on the radio
Salvation, oh yeah

[Chorus]
Brothers and sisters, fathers and mothers
Missus and misters, workers and lovers
Thank God, thank God for music
Get ready, Freddy, (Ooh) let's start the show (Ooh)
Rocks and he roll heavy, oh, now here we go
Thank God, thank God for music
Thank God for music

[Verse 3]
From the factory to a dream
From Liverpool to L.A
And all the world in between
So many sunny days

[Pre-Chorus]
There's a heaven on the radio
We sang along to every station
There's a heaven on the radio
Salvation, oh yeah

[Chorus]
Brothers and sisters, fathers and mothers
Missus and misters, workers and lovers
Thank God, thank God for music
Get ready, Freddy, (Ooh) let's start the show (Ooh)
Rocks and he roll heavy, oh, now here we go
Thank God, (Thank God, thank God) thank God for music
Thank God for music

[Chorus]
Brothers and sisters, fathers and mothers
Missus and misters, workers and lovers
Thank God, thank God for music (Thank God for music)
Get ready, Freddy, (Ooh) let's start the show (Ooh)
Rocks and he roll heavy, oh, now here we go
Thank God, thank God for music
Thank God for music

songs.full_title: Send Love Spread Peace by Ringo Starr
songs.title: Send Love Spread Peace
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Send love, spread peace
It's all in the world we need
Do all that needs done
To reach out to everyone
Imagine what a wonderful world it could be
(Wonderful world it could be)
Send love, (Send love) spread peace

[Verse]
When you feel there's nothing you can do
Close your eyes, visualize
It's up to you

[Chorus]
Send love, (Send love) spread peace (Spread peace)
It's all in the world we need
Do all that needs done
To reach out to everyone (Reach out to everyone)
Imagine what a wonderful world it could be
(Wonderful world it could be)
Send love, (Send love) spread peace

[Outro]
Imagine what a wonderful world it could be, yeah
(Wonderful world it could be)
Send love, (Send love) spread peace
Send love, (Send love) spread peace (Spread peace)
Send love, (Send love) spread peace
Send love

songs.full_title: What's My Name by Ringo Starr
songs.title: What’s My Name
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
From Paul to John
To playin' in German bars
From mono to stereo
Hittin' number one
And havin' all the fun
And lightin' up the radio

[Chorus]
Nothin' stays the same
But I'm still in the game
What's my name? (Ringo!)

[Verse 2]
Spinning 'round and 'round
We broke the speed of sound
Tearin' up the freeway
With the tumblin' of the dice
And gettin' bad advice
We had to call a mayday

[Verse 3]
They said we've had the last
We're a thing of the past
But I can still rock 'n' roll
You can't deny
We're doin' somethin' right
It's not my first rodeo

[Chorus]
Nothin' stays the same
But I'm still in the game
What's my name? (Ringo!)

[Bridge]
I can't get enough
Of peace and love
This is what I've come to understand
I'll pull myself together
Through all kinds of weather
I'll give you everything I can

[Verse 4]
Well, I've seen it all
From the mountains of Nepal
To Reno, Nevada
I've taken all the falls
I was climbin' up the walls
And now it doesn't matter

[Chorus]
Nothin' stays the same
But I'm still in the game
What's my name? (Ringo!)

[Outro]
Now I'm playing on the run
And there is only one
What's my name? (Ringo!)
I can feel the love
From the stars above
What's my name? (Ringo!)

Followin' the sun
Where the river runs
What's my name? (Ringo!)
Now I've raised my hands
All across the lands
What's my name? (Ringo!)

Nothin' stays the same
But I'm still in the game
Nothin' stays the same
But I'm still in the game
Nothin' stays the same
But I'm still in the game
Hey, what's my name? (Ringo!)
What's my name? (Ringo!)
